55 
56     def verify_token(self, token: str, token_type: str = "access") -> Dict[str, Any]:
57         """Verify and decode JWT token"""
58         try:
59             payload = jwt.decode(token, self.secret_key, algorithms=[self.algorithm])
60 
61             if payload.get("type") != token_type:
62                 raise HTTPException(
63                     status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED, detail="Invalid token type"
64                 )
65 
66             return payload
67 
68         except jwt.ExpiredSignatureError:
69             raise HTTPException(
70                 status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED, detail="Token has expired"
71             )
72         except jwt.JWTError:
73             raise HTTPException(status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED, detail="Invalid token")
74
results.issue_text: Possible hardcoded password: 'access'
